long_description: Easy, breezy and comfortable doing just about anything, the Merrell Encore Lattice Shoes slide on for comfort on summertime strolls. Airy, open-cell mesh uppers feel cool while covering your toes. Removable EVA footbeds are treated with AEGIS(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial solution to help prevent odors from forming. Merrell Qform(R) comfort EVA midsoles provide women-specific, stride-sequenced cushioning. Air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. Merrell Encore Lattice Shoes have sticky rubber soles.
short_description: Easy, breezy and comfortable doing just about anything, the Merrell Encore Lattice Shoes slide on for comfort on summertime strolls.
